data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Vaucluse, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Vaucluse, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Vaucluse, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary: On average, 75 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Vaucluse, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 551,900 people living in Vaucluse through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Vaucluse, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Berber, Mozabite people.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 6,781 believers in Vaucluse.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Vaucluse, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary:
the county of Vaucluse, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France has a population of 551,900.

We estimate Vaucluse has 6,781 people who might know Jesus, 337,498 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 207,621 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Vaucluse. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
